name: GoodAdds Foundation
overview:
GoodAdds brings together donors, causes, sponsors and online publishers to change the world for good. Our mission is to empower you to join a cause, make an impact, and stay connected in a personal and meaningful way.

GoodAdds is many good things, to many good people:

  • To donors, we are a revolutionary way to participate in, and share our experiences of, charitable giving online.
  • To causes, we are a free social marketing platform that empowers charities to effectively recruit and engage supporters online.
  • To sponsors, we are a means of advertising that can deliver true brand impact while making the world a better place.
  • To online publishers, we are a new kind of ad network to which unused, or undervalued, inventory can be donated and used by worthwhile causes.

Our founding cause is Millennium Promise, a nonprofit organization that helps build sustainable communities in rural sub-Saharan Africa, where extra help is critical to meet the UN Millennium Development Goals for 2015.

To learn more about Millennium Promise, please visit: www.millenniumpromise.org

Our founding sponsor is General Electric. With help from our sponsor, GE, 100% of your donation goes straight to the cause.
